welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Carrollton, a charming city known for its friendly locals, delicious food and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport houses most of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, United Airlines, and other airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse is primarily used by Southwest Airlines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves international flights and is also used by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights and is used by Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
